Date.description: The date of the stock data, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD.

Open.description: The opening price of the Netflix stock on the given date, in USD.

High.description: The highest price of the Netflix stock on the given date, in USD.

Low.description: The lowest price of the Netflix stock on the given date, in USD.

Close.description: The closing price of the Netflix stock on the given date, in USD.

Adj Close.description: The adjusted closing price of the Netflix stock on the given date, in USD. This price is adjusted for things like dividends, stock splits, and new stock offerings.

Volume.description: The number of shares of the Netflix stock that were traded on the given date.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in stock market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Netflix stock data, please predict the closing price.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in stock market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Netflix stock data, please predict the adjusted closing price.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted adjusted closing price is _______.
